results.name: Triangle read by rows, antidiagonals of an array (row r >= 1, column n >= 1) generated from a(2n) = r*a(n), a(2n+1) = a(n) + a(n+1).
comment: Companion to A178239 (the latter generated from a(n) = a(2n), a(2n+1) = r*a(n) + a(n+1)).
Polcoeff row r of the array as f(x) satisfies f(x)/f(x^2) = (1 + r*x + x^2).
Let q(x) = (1 + r*x + x^2). Then polcoeff row r = q(x) * q(x^2) * q(x^4) * q(x^8) * ...
Right border of the triangle = A002487: (1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 2, 3, 1, 4, 3, 5, ...).
Terms in r-th row mod r (for r > 1): (1, 0, 1, 0, 1, 0, ...).
formula: Given (1, r, 1, 0, 0, 0, ...) in each column of an infinite lower triangular matrix M; shifted down twice from the previous column. r-th row of the array = lim_{n->inf} M^n.
